ygData.subject: Re: New to this club
ygData.msgSnippet: half elves are good but my personal opinion is that for druid or ranger maybe a wood elf would be better.the deity you follow is your choice whatever choice
ygData.messageBody:
half elves are good but my personal opinion is
that for druid or ranger maybe a wood elf would be
better.the deity you follow is your choice whatever choice
you choose. i play on veeshan and mithaniel marr
mostly my self but am thinking of trying a role play
server.i do also think that eq was all for role play but
am finding new stuff out all the time.personally i
usually choose agnostic because it's easier to raise
factions when agnostic and npc's dont automatically hate
you usually hope this helps good luck,and by the way
go to any of the eq sites and they will tell you the
pro's and con's of each race far as class is concerned
